resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>a4e20ecc-9c29-11d8-aef7-889628b8efa3#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A yorktown-i csata</string>
            <string language="en">Battle of Yorktown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schlacht von Yorktown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bataille de Yorktown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Batalha de Yorktown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Battaglia di Yorktown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάχη Yorktown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Batalla de Yorktown</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az amerikai seregek döntő győzelme az angolok felett Yorktown-nál (1781). Washington a francia csapatokkal együtt vette be az angolok erődjét.</string>
            <string language="en">The american armys gain a critical victory on the english in Yroktown (1781). Washington with the french troops took the frotress of England</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Yorktown,  1781,  Egyesült Államok,  </string>
            <string language="en">Yorktown, 1781, The United States of America</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die amerikanischen armys gewinnen einen kritischen
Sieg auf Englisch in Yroktown (1781). Washington mit den 
französischen Truppen nahm die frotress von England</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les armys américains gagnent une victoire 
critique sur l'anglais dans Yroktown (1781). Washington avec les
troupes françaises a pris les frotress de l'Angleterre</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os armys americanos ganham uma vitória crítica 
no inglês em Yroktown (1781). Washington com as tropas 
francesas fêz exame dos frotress de Inglaterra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I armys americani guadagnano una vittoria critica
sull'inglese in Yroktown (1781). Washington con le truppe 
francesi ha preso i frotress dell'Inghilterra</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα αμερικανικά armys κερδίζουν μια κρίσιμη νίκη 
στους Αγγλους σε Yroktown (1781). Η Ουάσιγκτον με τα 
γαλλικά στρατεύματα πήρε τα frotress της Αγγλίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los armys americanos ganan una victoria crítica 
en el inglés en Yroktown (1781). Washington con las tropas 
francesas tomó los frotress de Inglaterra</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Yorktown, 1781, die Staaten von Amerika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Yorktown, 1781, Etats-Unis d'Amérique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Yorktown, 1781, o Estados Unidos da América</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Yorktown, 1781, unito Dichiara dell'America</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Yorktown, 1781, οι Ηνωμένες Πολιτείες της Αμερικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Yorktown, 1781, el Estados Unidos de América</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

version:3.0

        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
